44 POL_OP::POL_OP(std::string i2c_bus,
45  uint8_t A2D1_addr,
46  uint8_t A2D2_addr,
47  bool debug,
48  uint8_t channel){
49  uint8_t A2D_addrs[2] = {A2D1_addr, A2D2_addr};
50 
51  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++){
52  // Debugging output disabled by default
53  if (debug)
54  A2Ds[i].enableDebugging();
55 
56  // Initialise the A2Ds
57  if(!(A2Ds[i].begin(A2D_addrs[i], i2c_bus))){
58  LOG("A2D" << i+1 << " initialisation error. Exiting.");
59  exit(1);
60  }
61 
62  uint8_t rate = 1; //Default 0; 3 bit code is used to select the datarate, see datasheet
63  if(!(A2Ds[i].configureADCmode(ADS122C04_POL_OP_MODE, rate))){
64  LOG("A2D" << i+1 << " mode configuration error. Exiting.");
65  exit(1);
66  }
67 
68  // Start the ADC. Needed for continuous mode, redundant for single-shot
69  A2Ds[i].start();
70  A2Ds[i].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0); //Initialise mux channel
71  }
72 
73  LOG("POL_OP: Init success");
74 
75  // Set mux channel
76  this->channel = channel;
77 }
78 
97 uint32_t POL_OP::read_raw_data(SFE_ADS122C04 A2D, uint8_t delay){
98  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(delay));
99  A2D.start(); // Start conversion
100 
101  // Record the start time so we can timeout
102  // _millis() provided by A2D header, should fix this (bb_util)
103  unsigned long start_time = _millis();
104  bool drdy = false;
105 
106  while ((drdy == false) &&
107  (_millis() < (start_time + ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT))
108  ){
109 
110  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(5));
111  drdy = A2D.checkDataReady();
112  }
113 
114  if (drdy == false) {
115  LOG("DRDY timed out.");
116  return 0; // Error codes?
117  }
118 
119  // Read raw data
120  int32_t raw_ADC_data = A2D.readADC();
121  return raw_ADC_data;
122 }
123 
136 uint32_t POL_OP::read_continuous(SFE_ADS122C04 A2D, uint8_t delay){
137  // The data counter is not in use. This function assumes that the
138  // reading will be 'new'.
139  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(delay));
140  int32_t raw_ADC_data = A2D.readADC();
141  return raw_ADC_data;
142 }
143 
157 bool POL_OP::read_A2D(uint8_t idx, uint32_t* readings, uint8_t delay){
158  /*
159  Performs one complete read cycle of a specific A2D.
160  Results are stored in readings, which should be
161  declared by the caller.
162 
163  Output array should be large enough for both results.
164  */
165  if (idx > N_A2Ds - 1) {
166  LOG("A2D read err, A2D idx out of range.");
167  return false;
168  }
169 
170  A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN1);
171  readings[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
172  A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
173  readings[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
174 
175  return true;
176 }
177 
194 bool POL_OP::read_sensor(int *readings, uint8_t delay){
195  uint32_t out_1[2];
196  uint32_t out_2[2];
197 
198  bool r1 = read_A2D(0,out_1,delay);
199  bool r2 = read_A2D(1,out_2,delay);
200  if (!(r1 && r2)){
201  LOG("Error reading from one or more A2Ds.");
202  return false;
203  }
204 
205  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++){
206  // Sign-extended readings
207  readings[i] = (((int) out_1[i]) << 16) >> 16;
208  readings[i+2] =(((int) out_2[i]) << 16) >> 16;
209  }
210  std::bitset<32> c_read = readings[0];
211  std::bitset<32> c_read_1 = readings[1];
212 
213  // LOG("Reading[0]: " << c_read);
214  // LOG("Reading[1]: " << c_read_1);
215 
216  // Read successful
217  return true;
218 }

248 bool POL_OP::read_sensor_interleaved(int *readings, uint8_t delay){
249  uint32_t out_1[2] = {0,0};
250  uint32_t out_2[2] = {0,0};
251 
252  int read_times[4] = {0,0,0,0};
253 
254  auto start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
255  // Reads are interleaved to give the multiplexers a chance to change.
256  out_1[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[0], delay);
257  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
258  auto millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
259  read_times[0] = (int) millis.count();
260 
261  A2Ds[0].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
262 
263  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
264  out_2[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[1], delay);
265  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
266  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
267  read_times[1] = (int) millis.count();
268 
269 
270  A2Ds[1].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
271  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
272  out_1[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[0], delay);
273  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
274  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
275  read_times[2] = (int) millis.count();
276 
277  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
278  out_2[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[1], delay);
279  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
280  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
281  read_times[3] = (int) millis.count();
282 
283  // Reset multiplexers to starting position
284  A2Ds[0].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
285  A2Ds[1].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
286 
287  std::stringstream ss;
288  ss << "PD read times: [ ";
289  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++){
290  if (i < 3)
291  ss << read_times[i] << "ms, ";
292  else
293  ss << read_times[i] << "ms ] " << std::endl;
294  }
295 
296  /* Uncomment the lines below to print timing information. */
297  // std::cout << ss.str();
298  // std::cout << "delay: " << (int) delay << std::endl;
299  // std::cout << "o1: [" << out_1[0] << ", " << out_1[1] << "]" << std::endl;
300  // std::cout << "o2: [" << out_2[0] << ", " << out_2[1] << "]" << std::endl;
301  // std::cout << "millis: " << millis.count() << std::endl;
302 
303 
304  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++){
305  // Sign-extended readings
306  readings[i] = (((int) out_1[i]) << 16) >> 16;
307  readings[i+2] =(((int) out_2[i]) << 16) >> 16;
308  }
309  std::bitset<32> c_read = readings[0];
310  std::bitset<32> c_read_1 = readings[1];
311 
312  return true;
313 }

323 uint8_t POL_OP::get_channel(){ return this->channel; }
324 
337 bool POL_OP::set_gain(uint8_t gain){
338  bool ret = true;
339  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++) {
340  // For each A2D get the most recent initParams, update the
341  // gain and then reinitialise the chip.
342  ADS122C04_initParam* initParams = A2Ds[i].getCurrentInitParams();
343  initParams->gainLevel = gain;
344  ret = ret && A2Ds[i].reinitialise();
345  if (!ret) LOG("Reinitialisation error with ADC " << i+1);
346  }
347 
348  if (ret) LOG("POL_OP: Gain set to " << (int) gain << ".");
349  return ret;
350 }
351 
352 
372 bool POL_OP::set_data_rate(uint8_t rate){
373  bool ret = true;
374  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++) {
375  // For each A2D get the most recent initParams, update the
376  // gain and then reinitialise the chip.
377  ADS122C04_initParam* initParams = A2Ds[i].getCurrentInitParams();
378  initParams->dataRate = rate;
379  ret = ret && A2Ds[i].reinitialise();
380  if (!ret) LOG("Reinitialisation error with ADC " << i+1);
381  }
382 
383  if (ret) LOG("POL_OP: Data rate set to " << (int) rate << ".");
384  return ret;
385 }
